title: 78/124. Credentials of representatives to the seventy-eighth session of the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/78/124
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
21 December 2023 
 
23-25865 (E)    291223 
*2325865* 
 
 
Seventy-eighth session 
Agenda item 3 (b) 
Credentials of representatives to the seventy-eighth session 
of the General Assembly: report of the Credentials Committee 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 18 December 2023 
 
 
 
 
[without reference to a Main Committee (A/78/605, para. 14)] 
 
 
 78/124. Credentials of representatives to the seventy-eighth session of the 
General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Having considered the report of the Credentials Committee and the 
recommendation contained therein, 
 
Approves the report of the Credentials Committee.1 
 
48th plenary meeting 
18 December 2023 
 
__________________ 
 
1  A/78/605.
